TopicTitle: URKR Luun MK4 - two man lander

Articles.Content:
Intended for all airless bodies except Moho (can be done with extra tanks on top of the docking ring) or Tylo. Not actually tested anywhere but on MÃƒÂ¼n.

Ladders upwards (action-06) so jetpacks are not needed when transferring to/from mother ship. Action-07 for bottom ladders and toggles science instruments.

Docking ring is root part.

Can in principle emergency land on Kerbin if fuel is managed carefully so you don't run out but have so little left that TWR >1 -- but has so far not resulted in more than one half the crew, at most, surviving.

Download: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bz81WxkFXuN7TllWWDR3Tl9LVEk/edit?usp=sharing
